meta.content: Taylor Exemplar Academy is a free public charter school that is dedicated to academic excellence while preparing students for their futures.
meta.name: description

meta.content: Home | Taylor MI | Taylor Exemplar Academy
Taylor Exemplar Academy is a free public charter school that is dedicated to academic excellence while preparing students for their futures.

div.div:
Out of an abundance of caution, and in alignment with Gov. Gretchen Whitmer's order, we have decided to suspend classes at all NHA Michigan schools. Learn more about the closure and food services during this time.
The Board Meeting Notices notify the public of any special, rescheduled, or canceled Board meetings for the current school year, including public Board meetings being held via electronic means.

div.p: We offer an advanced curriculum in math for 8th grade students who are ready for more challenging material or to learn at an accelerated pace.

We never set limits on how much your child can achieve. At Taylor Exemplar Academy we create endless opportunities for your child to become their best. We shape instruction to build on the strengths and abilities of each child and make moral focus lessons part of every school day. As a result, our students thrive.
At Taylor we create endless opportunities for your child to become their best.

div.div: The student selection lottery results for next school year (2020-21) are in! View lottery results for details.

p.big: Taylor Exemplar outperformed the local district on the state test for the last ten years.

img.style: border:0px solid black; height:161px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-top:0px; width:500px

div.blockquote:
Taylor Exemplar Academy outperformed the local district on the state test for the last five years.
Taylor Exemplar—where kids succeed!
div.p: Individualized instruction BEGINS with a personalized TOUR. Take a tour of our school, visit our classrooms, and ask questions. Discover how our personalized teaching meets the unique needs of your child.

div.h3: Taylor Exemplar Principal Reads Moral Focus Bedtime Stories Virtually

div.p: Are you seeking a "private" school education with the no-cost benefit of a public school? If so, you're in the right place. Taylor Exemplar Academy is a tuition-free public charter school open to all children who live in Michigan.

section.aria-label: Spotlight:Detroit Red Wings School Assembly Team Visits Taylor Exemplar Academy

div.h2: Spotlight:Detroit Red Wings School Assembly Team Visits Taylor Exemplar Academy
div.blockquote: Students at Taylor Exemplar Academy recently enjoyed an energy-filled assembly courtesy of the Detroit Red Wings School Assembly Program.

div.p: We know there are a lot of factors in deciding where your child will go to school and we want to help. Use our live chat or leave your information and we will be in touch.
We would love to show you our world so contact us to schedule a tour. We also hold open houses where you can meet our amazing teachers.
We can’t wait to share your child’s journey! Apply online, in person, or over the phone and don’t hesitate to ask us questions along the way! We are here for you.
Join us in teaching the next generation! At National Heritage Academies we are always looking for great leaders to join our team!
